scripts.release-generate-doc-and-commit: npm run release && npm run generate-doc-and-commit && echo Released successfully!
scripts.generate-doc-and-commit: npm run generate-project-doc && (git status --untracked-files=all --porcelain ./documentation | grep . && (git reset && git add ./documentation && git commit -m "docs(project-doc): update project documentation" && echo Documentation updated successfully! || echo Error generating the documentation) || echo No documentation updates were detected, aborting unnecessary commit about docs generation...)
scripts.view-documentation: sh -c 'if test -f "./documentation/index.html"; then npx --no-install http-server ./documentation -a localhost -p 33449 -P http://localhost:33449? -o http://localhost:33449?; else echo There is no document generated yet, please run the following command: "npm run generate-project-doc"; fi;'
